pkgmetadata.longdescription: Optional Login and Registration Module System for ShinyApps // Package creates UI modules for Login, Register and Password Reset boxes and server module for reading and writing user database contained within googlesheet or sqlite file. Creates automatic e-mail messages after registration and for resetting password procedure. Currently supports English language (default) and Polish. The authentication system created with shiny.reglog is designed to be optional: user don't need to be logged-in to access your application, but when logged-in the user data can be used to read from and write to relational databases.
